SAMPLE TRIBAL CODE
Enacted by the Tribal Council

TITLE 1 - GENERAL PROVISIONS

CHAPTER 1 - DEFINITIONS
1-1-1. Short Title.
This code shall be known as the Sample Tribal Code.

1-1-2. Definitions.
The following terms have specified meanings in this Code.

CHAPTER 2 - JURISDICTION
1-2-1. Civil Jurisdiction.
The Tribal Court has civil jurisdiction over all matters.

1-2-2. Criminal Jurisdiction.
The Tribal Court has criminal jurisdiction as provided by law.

TITLE 2 - GOVERNMENT ORGANIZATION

CHAPTER 1 - TRIBAL COUNCIL
2-1-1. Authority.
The Tribal Council is the governing body.

2-1-2. Powers.
The Council shall have all powers granted by the Constitution.

CHAPTER 2 - EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
2-2-1. Chairman.
The Chairman presides over Council meetings.
